net.parallaxed.bluejam.grammar
Class PitchModel

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.HashMap<Pitch,double[]>
          net.parallaxed.bluejam.grammar.PitchModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<Pitch,double[]>
public class PitchModel
extends java.util.HashMap<Pitch,double[]>

The PitchModel class represents a 1-order Markov model describing a probability matrix of Pitches. The model is a lookup table that will return P(X|Y), where X and Y are a set of notes in a given context. For more complex models, this class could be written to include support for cases where Y is a series of notes, increasing the order of the model up to the number of notes in Y. Models must be locked after loading before use, such that no further changes can be made to a model, and the model is deemed valid. Please see additional documentation and the technical report for information regarding pitch models.

Author:
Ciarán Rowe (csr2@kent.ac.uk)
See Also:

Method Detail

put

public double[] put(Pitch pitch,
                    double[] model)
Adds a single pitch, giving the probability series for other notes in the model following that pitch. This function will replace any existing pitches matching the passed pitch. The model must be editable to make changes.

Specified by:
put in interface java.util.Map<Pitch,double[]>
Overrides:
put in class java.util.HashMap<Pitch,double[]>
Parameters:
pitch - The pitch to add.
model - The matrix of probabilities to append to the model for that pitch.
Returns:
The model matrix that was replaced, if any.

putAll

public double[] putAll(java.util.Map<Pitch,double[]> m)
Puts a Map of notes into the model.

Parameters:
m - The map to add to the model
Returns:
The last model replaced, if any.

validateModel

public void validateModel()
Protected call to the internal _validateModel() This method locks the model if validation is successful.

get

public double[] get(Pitch key)
Parameters:
key - The pitch to return the model for.
Returns:
The model for the given pitch.

getPitch

public Pitch getPitch(int index)
Pitch order is preserved when adding to the model. Models remain square matrices, for every new pitch, a new row and new column is appended to the table.

Parameters:
index - The index sought.
Returns:
The pitch at the passed index of the model
